entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
